Derby,{{cite web|title=Tables Updated After LA Derby Win|url=http://www.prostamerika.com/2011/10/16/tables-updated-after-la-derby-win-51037/|work=Prost Amerika Soccer|date=16 October 2011|accessdate=18 October 2011}} ''El ClÃ¡sico Angelino'' | image = [[File:Los Angeles Galaxy logo.svg|110px]] [[File:Chivas USA logo.svg|110px]] | city or region = {{flagicon|USA}} [[Carson, California]], [[United States]] | first contested = 23 April 2005 | teams involved = [[Los Angeles Galaxy]] & [[C.D. Drawn: 6
Chivas USA: 3 | largestvictory = *Galaxy 5â2 Chivas (Aug 2005) *Galaxy 3â0 Chivas (Sept 2006) *Chivas 3â0 Galaxy (Aug 2007) *Chivas 3â0 Galaxy (Sept 2007) *Galaxy 5â2 Chivas (Apr 2008) }} The '''Honda SuperClasico''', also known as the '''L.A. Derby''' or '''''El ClÃ¡sico Angelino'''''{{Citation needed|date=October 2011}}, is a [[sports rivalry]] that exists between [[Major League Soccer]] teams [[Los Angeles Galaxy]] and [[C.D. Chivas USA]]. The rivalry is considered as the only "true" local derby in MLS as both teams are based in the [[Greater Los Angeles Area|Greater Los Angeles]] city of [[Carson, California|Carson]], [[California]]. The word "SuperClasico" is an allegory to the [[El SÃºper ClÃ¡sico (Mexico)|Mexican SÃºper ClÃ¡sico]] between [[Club AmÃ©rica]] and Chivas USA's parent club [[C.D. Guadalajara|Chivas Guadalajara]]. The term "ClÃ¡sico" is commonly used to refer to other rivalries in [[Hispanophone|Spanish-speaking countries]], most prominently, Argentina's [[SuperclÃ¡sico]] between [[Boca Juniors]] and [[Club AtlÃ©tico River Plate|River Plate]] or Spain's [[El ClÃ¡sico]] between [[FC Barcelona|Barcelona]] and [[Real Madrid C.F.|Real Madrid]]. The derby is sponsored by [[automobile|auto company]] [[Honda]].{{Citation needed|date=October 2011}} From 2005-2007, the derby was 4 league matches. In 2008-2009, the derby was played three times (plus a two-legged playoff series in 2009). Starting in 2010, the derby will be played twice. All games are played at [[The Home Depot Center]] which serves as the local venue for both teams. So far, the Galaxy lead Chivas in the derby, having won six of seven cups all time.http://www.pe.com/sports/breakout/stories/PE_Sports_Local_W_soccer_column_31.48ba139.html ==2008 matches== {{Football box |date = April 26, 2008 |team1 = [[C.D.
